plugins.name: Magic Renamer AI - With Design Token mode
plugins.description:
Magic Renamer AI is a Figma plugin that lets you automatically rename all your layers in one click (up to 120 layers at once, with design token support).


With AI, it suggests clear and consistent names that follow design and design system best practices.


🔥Key features:


  1. Smart, instant renaming: The AI analyzes your file and suggests relevant names for each layer.
  2. Time-saving: No more manual renaming—everything is done in seconds, even for large files.
  3. Clarity and consistency: Naming conventions are enforced, making teamwork easier.
  4. Simple interface: One-click use, no complicated setup. Advanced options are available if you need them.
  5. Design token support: Perfect for solo or teams using advanced design systems.
  6. Custom API support: Use your own API key (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Perplexity, or OpenRouter) for more control.


💡 Why choose Magic Renamer AI?

Unlike other plugins, Magic Renamer AI uses artificial intelligence to understand the context of each layer and suggest names tailored to your project. It ensures consistency, reduces errors, and fits seamlessly into your Figma workflow. It’s the perfect tool to save time, improve file quality, and speed up your design process.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered batch renaming for Layers — up to 120 at once -> Clarity | Consistency

plugins.name: Scenario Stamp
plugins.description:
Scenario Stamp helps product designers create clean, consistent headers for their prototype flows. Add project names, scenario titles, and essential metadata—so developers and stakeholders instantly understand what they're looking at.


No more guessing games or messy handoffs. Just drop in a stamp, label your work, and keep your Figma files organized and handoff-ready.


✅ Perfect for:


Organizing prototype flows


Prepping for developer handoff


Communicating design intent


Making your files easier to navigate


Make your designs speak for themselves—with Scenario Stamp.

plugins.name: Spacing and radius fixer
plugins.description:
Auto-fix spacing & radius

Plugin that automatically rounds spacing and radius values to the nearest preset value in Auto Layout objects.


What it does

- Rounds gap and padding values to the nearest preset spacing

- Rounds corner radius to the nearest preset radius

- Works with any Auto Layout object (frames, components, instances)


Presets

Default values (can be customized in plugin):

Spacing: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, 64, 80 (px)

Radius: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 100 (px)


How to use

1. Select Auto Layout object(s)

2. Run the plugin

3. Switch between Spacing/Radius modes

4. Customize presets if needed (or use Reset to restore defaults)

5. Click Apply
plugins.tagline: Fixes inconsistent spacing and radius values by rounding them to the nearest preset

plugins.name: xps.to.design — by ‹div›RIOTS — Import XPS documents (.xps and .oxps)
plugins.description:
Import any XPS document as fully editable Figma designs.


Convert any XPS document into Figma designs. Import your XPS into Figma as designs with fully editable text layers, or as static, pixel-perfect images.


How to import XPS documents into Figma:

  1. Run this Figma plugin, xps.to.design
  2. Upload your file, or drag-and-drop it into the plugin
  3. Click “Import”
  4. Your document will be imported into Figma as fully-editable layers or high-res images!


Why use xps.to.design?

  1. Extract images and text from your XPSs and get them straight into Figma.
  2. Collaborate on XPS documents with your team in Figma.
  3. Use XPS as templates for new designs in Figma.
  4. And much more!


FREE

  1. 5 imports
  2. Imports as editable layers: First 3 pages only


PRO License

  1. Full features, multiple files at once and unlimited imports
  2. $49 for 1-year (not recurring)

or

  1. $99 for 3-years (not recurring)

accepted.name: divRIOTS
accepted.description: Making better tools so designers and developers can focus on what matters and work collaboratively as a team.

plugins.tagline: Import any XPS document as fully editable Figma designs

plugins.name: FigCrawl
plugins.description:
FigCrawl: Your FigJam Content Extractor


What is FigCrawl?

FigCrawl is a powerful FigJam plugin that transforms your collaborative boards into structured, AI-ready data. It intelligently extracts and organizes all your board's content while preserving the visual hierarchy and relationships between elements.


Use Cases

For Designers & Teams

  1. Extract structured content from brainstorming sessions
  2. Convert visual collaboration into actionable data
  3. Document and archive board content
  4. Share board content in a structured format


For AI/LLM Integration

  1. Feed board content into AI tools
  2. Generate summaries and reports
  3. Analyze relationships between ideas
  4. Create structured documentation


For Documentation

  1. Export board content for documentation
  2. Create structured reports
  3. Archive important board sessions
  4. Share insights with stakeholders



How It Works

  1. Launch: Open the plugin in your FigJam board
  2. Extract: Click "Extract Content" to scan your board
  3. Review: See a summary of extracted content
  4. Copy: Choose to copy the entire board or individual pages
  5. Use: Paste the JSON into your preferred AI tool or LLM
plugins.tagline: Extract FigJam content into AI-ready data with one click

plugins.name: Duplication
plugins.description:
Figma Duplication Plugin

What It Does

The Figma Duplication Plugin is designed to create multiple copies of a selected frame, automatically populating text fields with data from a CSV file. Key features include:


  1. Bulk Duplication: Create multiple copies of a selected frame
  2. Dynamic Text Replacement: Update text content in each duplicate using CSV data
  3. Organized Layout: Automatically arrange duplicates in a grid layout within a new section

How To Use It

  1. Select a Frame: First, select the frame you want to duplicate in your Figma file.


  1. Launch the Plugin: Open the Duplication Plugin from your plugins panel.


Configure Settings:

  1. Enter the number of copies you want to create
  2. Select which text layers you want to modify (you can add multiple)
  3. Upload a CSV file containing the data for text replacement

CSV Format Requirements:


  1. The CSV headers must exactly match the names of the text layers you want to modify
  2. Each row represents data for one duplicate
  3. The plugin will read values from the columns corresponding to your selected text layers
  4. Click Submit: The plugin will create your duplicates in a new section with all text fields updated according to your CSV data.


Limitations

  1. Works only with frames containing text layers
  2. CSV headers must exactly match the text layer names


This plugin is ideal for creating multiple versions of components that differ only in text content, such as cards, buttons, or profile items with different data
plugins.tagline: Tired of filling in your data? just use this ! :D

127056.name: Duplication
127056.description:
Figma Duplication Plugin

What It Does

How To Use It

127056.tagline: Tired of filling in your data? just use this ! :D

plugins.name: Private Notes
plugins.description:
Private Notes allows you to attach personal annotations to any layer in your Figma file that remain completely private to you.


  1. Truly Private: Notes are stored locally and their contents are only visible to you, never to other collaborators
  2. Visual Markers: Customisable markers show where you've left notes (only visible when you run the plugin)
  3. Flexible Positioning: Place note markers in 8 different positions around your layers that stay fixed to the right frame.
  4. Persistent Storage: Your notes remain attached to layers even when you close and reopen Figma


Perfect for designers who want to keep track of personal thoughts, reminders, and to-dos without cluttering the file with comments visible to everyone.


Use it for recording client feedback, noting implementation details, or leaving yourself breadcrumbs for areas that need further attention.


Please contact me for any feedback. suggestions or issues!
plugins.tagline: Keep your thoughts private- annotations only you can see.

plugins.name: Quick Variant
plugins.description:
Allows designers to quickly cycle through component variants for selected instances. With simple commands, you can switch to the next or previous variant of a component, streamlining your design workflow.


Key features


  1. Rapidly explore different component states without manual swapping
  2. Efficiently test various design options in context
  3. Seamlessly navigate complex component sets
  4. Boost productivity when working with design systems


Perfect for designers who frequently work with component variants and want to speed up their iteration process.
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to swap variants of components

plugins.name: Import CSS shadows, create Figma styles
plugins.description:
I recently needed to create a Figma file from an existing website, and manually setting up effects took too long, so I created this plugin.


You can paste a CSS box-shadow, preview it, then create a style from all the shadow values.


You can also create matching variables. There is a small caveat: the Figma plugin API does not allow you to connect the style with the variable from within the plugin itself, meaning the style is disconnected from the variable. It still saves a tonne of time though!

accepted.name: Luis Ouriach
accepted.description:
Design & community @figmadesign. I write a newsletter, manage and host @8pxmag. 

Hot sauce on everything.

plugins.tagline: Copy, paste, generate

Плагин заменяет пробел после предлогов на неразрывный. Так в тексте не будет висящих предлогов и все переносы буду выполнены правильно.


Список предлогов и слов, после которых будет ставиться неразрывный пробле можно редактировать.
130474.release_notes: Улучшена стабильность работы и обработка пограничных случаев
130474.tagline: Пробелы, неразрывный пробел, переносы, русский язык, автоматизация, автозамена

plugins.name: SVG Export no Fill
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to export SVG icons from Figma without the fill attribute, making it easy to modify the icon colors later. You can upload the SVG files to platforms like Elementor or use them with CSS to easily change icon colors via the interface or stylesheets.

Ideal for developers who need reusable, customizable icons that can be easily adapted in various projects.
plugins.tagline: Export SVG icons without fill for easy CSS styling

130213.name: SVG Export no Fill
130213.description:
This plugin allows you to export SVG icons from Figma without the fill attribute, making it easy to modify the icon colors later. You can upload the SVG files to platforms like Elementor or use them with CSS to easily change icon colors via the interface or stylesheets.

Ideal for developers who need reusable, customizable icons that can be easily adapted in various projects.
130213.tagline: Export SVG icons without fill for easy CSS styling

plugins.name: Translate Text with Gemini
plugins.description:
Translate Text with Gemini is a powerful yet lightweight Figma plugin that helps you quickly translate any selected text nodes into over 30 languages using Google’s Gemini AI.


✨ Key Features:

•Supports App Store Connect languages (e.g. French, Japanese, Arabic, Vietnamese, etc.)

•Smart deduplication — identical phrases are only translated once

•Structured output parsing to ensure accurate mapping

•Custom language support beyond the dropdown list

•Built for speed and scale (bulk translate entire Frames/Sections)


🔒 Your API key is safely stored per session.


Created with ❤️ by Giang Nguyen.
plugins.tagline: Effortless multilingual translation for your Figma designs.

128664.name: Translate Text with Gemini
128664.description:

128664.tagline: Effortless multilingual translation for your Figma designs.

plugins.name: ProdMax
plugins.description:
Prodmax - 10X Your Ideas into Software Execllence


ProdMax is an innovative intelligent frontend development platform that seamlessly integrates with both Web interfaces and Figma plugins to transform design mockups into high-quality frontend code. The platform aims to significantly enhance development efficiency, foster team collaboration, and streamline the design-to-development workflow.


Use Case:


Step 1. User Authentication

  1. Users complete secure authentication through the account-password login system to access the platform workspace

Step 2. Intelligent Component Creation

  1. Select target layers in the Figma interface
  2. Click the "New Biz Component" button to initiate component creation
  3. Add professional naming and functional descriptions for the component
  4. View corresponding DSL node structures in the component details page
  5. Support editing or deleting created components as needed

Step 3. Intelligent Page Construction

  1. Select page-level layers in Figma
  2. Click the "New Page" button to initiate page creation
  3. Add semantic naming and functional descriptions for the page
  4. View complete DSL node structures in the page details interface
  5. Support editing or deleting created pages as needed
plugins.tagline: 10X Your Ideas into Software Execllence

plugins.name: Text Styles from CSV
plugins.description:
**Text Styles from CSV** is a Figma plugin that allows users to import text styles directly from a CSV file, saving time and ensuring consistency across projects.


### ✨ Features:

- 📂 Import text styles from a CSV file with one click.

- 🔠 Supports font family, weight, size, letter spacing, and line height.

- 🎨 Automatically creates text styles in Figma for easy reuse.

- ⚡ Speeds up the design process by reducing manual styling.


### 📌 How It Works:

1. Open the plugin in Figma.

2. Upload your CSV file containing text style definitions.

3. Click "Import" to instantly create and apply styles.


For more details, check the **[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/metagrati/text-styles-from-csv).**
plugins.tagline: Import text styles into Figma from a CSV file. Automate typography styles creation.

120678.name: Text Styles from CSV
120678.description:
**Text Styles from CSV** is a Figma plugin that allows users to import text styles directly from a CSV file, saving time and ensuring consistency across projects.


### ✨ Features:

- 🔠 Supports font family, weight, size, letter spacing, and line height.

- 🎨 Automatically creates text styles in Figma for easy reuse.

- ⚡ Speeds up the design process by reducing manual styling.


### 📌 How It Works:

1. Open the plugin in Figma.

2. Upload your CSV file containing text style definitions.

3. Click "Import" to instantly create and apply styles.


For more details, check the **[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/metagrati/text-styles-from-csv).**
120678.tagline: Import text styles into Figma from a CSV file. Automate typography styles creation.

plugins.name: Feedback Factory - Generate Feedback Screens from Spreadsheet Data
plugins.description:
The Feedback Factory is a plugin designed to streamline the creation of feedback screen variants from spreadsheet data.


Here's how to use it:


1. Upload Excel File 📂: Start by uploading an spreadsheet file containing feedback types and their respective content. The plugin will process this data to generate feedback variants.


2. Create Variants 🎨: Add up to 10 variants by selecting a feedback type for each one. The plugin allows you to customize titles, descriptions, and button texts for each variant.


3. Generate Components 🚀: Once your variants are set, click "Create Variants" to automatically generate the feedback components in Figma. The plugin will clone the selected frame or component and update the text elements based on the spreadsheet data.


This tool is perfect for designers looking to efficiently manage and create multiple feedback screens with consistent styling and content.
plugins.tagline: Generate feedback screens in Figma from spreadsheet data with ease and efficiency.

120235.name: Feedback Factory - Generate Feedback Screens from Spreadsheet Data
120235.description:
The Feedback Factory is a plugin designed to streamline the creation of feedback screen variants from spreadsheet data.


Here's how to use it:


1. Upload Excel File 📂: Start by uploading an spreadsheet file containing feedback types and their respective content. The plugin will process this data to generate feedback variants.


2. Create Variants 🎨: Add up to 10 variants by selecting a feedback type for each one. The plugin allows you to customize titles, descriptions, and button texts for each variant.


3. Generate Components 🚀: Once your variants are set, click "Create Variants" to automatically generate the feedback components in Figma. The plugin will clone the selected frame or component and update the text elements based on the spreadsheet data.


This tool is perfect for designers looking to efficiently manage and create multiple feedback screens with consistent styling and content.

networkAccess.reasoning: Required to load feedback data from online spreadsheet

120235.release_notes: Added use of csv in addition to Excel
120235.tagline: Generate feedback screens in Figma from spreadsheet data with ease and efficiency.

plugins.name: ARBFromDesign
plugins.description: Streamline your localization workflow with the ARBFromDesign plugin for Figma. This tool automatically extracts text from your Figma frames and generates ARB (Application Resource Bundle) entries in camelCase format, ready for translation. The plugin intelligently excludes date and time formats, ensuring clean and accurate entries. With a simple click, you can export your design text to ARB files, speeding up your localization process and making your designs truly global.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Generate ARB Entries from Your Figma Designs

With a simple click, you can export your design text to ARB files, speeding up your localization process and making your designs truly global.

plugins.name: Material Design Icons (MDI)
plugins.description:
Access to thousands of Material Design Icons — Instantly elevate your design workflow with a complete, up-to-date library of Material Design Icons, right inside Figma!


🎨 Fully customizable – Change size, color, and stroke directly within Figma to match your project’s style effortlessly.


🔍 Powerful search – Find exactly the icon you need in seconds with intelligent keyword-based filtering.


🧩 Organized categories – Browse icons by category (e.g., navigation, social, UI elements) for faster discovery and inspiration.


⚡ One-click insert – Drop icons into your design with a single click—no need to leave Figma or download external assets.


🛠️ Perfect for UI/UX designers – Maintain design consistency and follow Google’s Material Design guidelines with pixel-perfect icons.


🌐 Always up to date – Get the latest MDI icons automatically—no manual updates required.


✨ Whether you're designing apps, websites, or dashboards, the MDI Library plugin gives you everything you need to work smarter and design faster.

plugins.name: Tailwind Text Styles Generator
plugins.description:
Tailwind Text Style Generator is a Figma plugin that helps you automatically generate text styles from Google Fonts, based on Tailwind typography scale.


Tired of manually creating text styles and organizing layers one by one? This plugin does it all for you:


🎨 Choose from 1,800+ Google Fonts

📏 Auto-generate Text Styles using Tailwind-friendly sizing (sm, base, lg, xl, etc.)

⚡ Perfect for dev-design alignment especially for teams using Tailwind CSS

📁 Organized neatly: styles are grouped and named by scale

🔁 Try different fonts freely great for experimenting and iterating

💾 Instantly saved into your current design system


Whether you're building a design system or just want to speed up your workflow, this plugin makes it seamless, scalable, and developer-friendly.
plugins.tagline: 1.800 Fonts. 1 Click. Done.

plugins.name: SVG Exporter
plugins.description:
Este plugin te permite exportar elementos gráficos (assets) en formato SVG desde cualquier Frame que selecciones en Figma. Al ejecutarlo:

1. El plugin detecta automáticamente los vectores, íconos y componentes dentro del frame seleccionado.

2. Muestra una lista con vista previa de cada asset, su nombre y tipo (VECTOR, LINE, COMPONENT, etc.).

3. Puedes filtrar por tipo, seleccionar o deseleccionar assets individualmente o todos a la vez.

4. Al hacer clic en “Exportar selección”, los archivos se descargan en un ZIP listo para usar.


Uso paso a paso:

• Selecciona un Frame que contenga los assets que deseas exportar.

• Ejecuta el plugin.

• Filtra, selecciona y exporta.


Limitaciones actuales:

• Solo funciona si seleccionas un Frame (no soporta múltiples frames a la vez).

• Solo exporta elementos compatibles con formato SVG.

• No incluye imágenes rasterizadas, texto plano ni auto layout como exportables.

• No detecta automáticamente cambios de selección; requiere usar el botón “Actualizar selección”.



-----------------------------------------


This plugin lets you export graphical elements (assets) as SVG files from any selected Frame in Figma.


When you run the plugin:

1. It scans the selected frame for valid exportable elements (e.g., VECTORS, ICONS, COMPONENTS).

2. You’ll see a list of assets with preview thumbnails, names, and their Figma types.

3. You can filter by type, toggle selection, and bulk-select assets.

4. Clicking “Export Selection” downloads all selected assets as a clean ZIP file of SVGs.


How to use it:

• Select a Frame that contains the assets you want to export.

• Launch the plugin.

• Use the filters, select assets, and export.


Current limitations:

• Only one Frame can be selected at a time.

• Only elements that support SVG export will be included (e.g., no bitmaps or text layers).

• Does not automatically react to new selections — use the “Refresh Selection” button manually when needed.
plugins.tagline: Exporta fácilmente assets SVG desde frames seleccionados en Figma, con vista previa y filtros.

131009.description: CapitalizeText is a sleek and powerful Figma plugin designed to simplify your text editing workflow. With just a click, convert selected text layers to uppercase or lowercase, saving you time and ensuring consistency across your designs. Featuring a modern, intuitive interface with vibrant visuals, CapitalizeText makes text transformation seamless and enjoyable. Perfect for designers who value efficiency and precision. Try it now and elevate your Figma experience
131009.tagline: Effortlessly Transform Text Case in Figma

plugins.name: Latin ⇄ Cyrillic
plugins.description:
Instantly flip any text layer—or whole frames—from Latin to Serbian Cyrillic and back.


🛠 How it works

• Select text, groups, frames, or the entire page

• Run Plugins → “Latin ➜ Cyrillic” or “Cyrillic ➜ Latin”

• Fonts auto‑load, characters swap, you’re done


✨ Why it’s handy

• Keeps typographic styles intact (font, size, color)

• Handles digraphs (dž, lj, nj, dj) correctly

• Works inside components, variants, and instances

• Zero setup, zero UI—pure speed


⚠️ Limitations

• Only supports Serbian alphabet (no Russian/Belarusian rules yet)

• Ignores mixed selections locked inside Boolean Ops
plugins.tagline: One‑click Serbian Latin ⇄ Cyrillic transliteration

plugins.name: Smart Frame Organizer
plugins.description:
Smart Frame Tools helps you organize, duplicate, align, and rename frames in seconds — no dragging, no chaos.


Designed for precision layouts, this plugin includes smart features to:


Automatically rename frames left-to-right, top-to-bottom


Align selected frames into clean grids


Enforce consistent horizontal spacing


Duplicate and insert frames intelligently with automatic renaming


Perfect for UI designers, developers, and anyone working with structured layouts in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Smart Frame Tools — Precision layout. Effortless control.

128642.name: Smart Frame Organizer
128642.description:

Duplicate and insert frames intelligently with automatic renaming


Perfect for UI designers, developers, and anyone working with structured layouts in Figma.
128642.tagline: Smart Frame Tools — Precision layout. Effortless control.

plugins.name: Move to Origin
plugins.description:
Move to Origin is a simple utility plugin that positions your selected elements so that the topmost and leftmost element sits precisely at coordinates (0,0).


Instructions

1. Select one or more elements on your Figma canvas

2. Run the "Move to Origin" plugin from the Plugins menu

3. Your selection will instantly move so the topmost-leftmost element is at (0,0)


Key features:

  1. One-click positioning to origin point (0,0)
  2. Maintains relative spacing between all selected elements
  3. Works with any number of selected objects
  4. No UI — just select and run


Perfect for:

  1. Cleaning up artboard layouts
  2. Preparing elements for export
  3. Standardizing component positions
  4. Aligning multiple elements to a predictable starting point


Simply select the elements you want to reposition, run the plugin, and watch as your selection snaps to the origin while preserving the spatial relationships between all elements.


Save time and maintain precision in your designs with this essential positioning tool.
plugins.tagline: Instantly align your selection to (0,0) while preserving relative positions between elements.

plugins.name: Code Highlighter
plugins.description:
Code Highlighter Plugin for Figma


The Code Highlighter plugin for Figma allows you to easily add syntax-highlighted code snippets into your designs. It supports multiple programming languages like JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, and helps you present code in a clean, readable way within your Figma files.
plugins.tagline: Code Highlighter Plugin for Figma
